    • A little bit about myself

    Hi! My name is Mariusz, I am also known as Vallode on the internet

    I am a front-end developer who works mostly freelance, I do want to settle down into a full-time job though! Hopefully somewhere in the Netherlands, as I love the country and am learning dutch!
    I partake in a lot of hobbyist activities, I enjoy painting and reading. I have many plants that I enjoy taking care of and I like collecting magnets from different places in the world I visit

    I have a great passion for all things tech, mainly for programming and computer science and I hope to work my way towards being a full-stack developer. After that, who knows!
